abstract: Col Veaceslav Rusu explains joint maneuvers involving around 800 troops from Moldova, United States, Romania, Poland and Georgia, which are taking place in Balti, Moldovia, are designed to test cooperative abilities of joint force; such regional exercises have increased since Ukrainian unrest.
lead_paragraph: About 800 troops from Moldova, the United States, Romania, Poland and Georgia are taking part in joint military exercises in Moldova.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Moldova: Joint Military Exercises Begin

snippet: About 800 troops from Moldova, the United States, Romania, Poland and Georgia are taking part in joint military exercises in Moldova.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
